https://supabase.com/pricing.title: Supabase Pricing & Plans
https://supabase.com/pricing.info: Supabase Storage: 1GB free storage, 5GB egress bandwidth, 50MB max upload. Paid: $0.021/GB storage, $0.09/GB egress. Basic CDN in free, Smart CDN in paid tiers.

https://cloudinary.com/pricing.title: Cloudinary Pricing & Plans
https://cloudinary.com/pricing.info: Free tier: 25GB storage (DAM) or 25 credits (API). Paid tiers: Plus $99/month, Advanced $249/month. Full image optimization suite, CDN included, high-performance delivery.

https://docs.github.com/billing/managing.title: Git LFS Billing Documentation
https://docs.github.com/billing/managing.info: GitHub LFS free tier: 10GB storage, 10GB bandwidth. Paid: $0.07/GiB storage, bandwidth billed. No explicit file size limits, designed for large files with version control.

https://aws.amazon.com/s3/pricing/.title: AWS S3 Pricing
https://aws.amazon.com/s3/pricing/.info: AWS S3 free tier: 5GB Standard storage for 12 months, 20K GET requests, 2K PUT requests. Standard storage: $0.023/GB, Infrequent Access: $0.0125/GB. First 100GB/month transfer free across AWS services.

https://www.cloudflare.com/plans/free/.title: Cloudflare Free Plan
https://www.cloudflare.com/plans/free/.info: Free tier includes unlimited CDN bandwidth, security features, DDoS protection. Separate Images product for optimization, R2 for storage. Global edge locations for content delivery.

https://www.cachefly.com/news/sustainabi.title: Image Optimization and CDN Cost Reduction
https://www.cachefly.com/news/sustainabi.info: Image optimization can achieve 25-40% file size reduction with WebP, and up to 50% with AVIF compared to JPEG. Modern compression tools and responsive images significantly reduce bandwidth consumption.

https://www.inxy.hosting/blog-posts/opti.title: CDN Cost Optimization Strategies
https://www.inxy.hosting/blog-posts/opti.info: CDN optimization strategies include multi-CDN setups (up to 40% cost reduction), efficient caching techniques, regional load distribution, and content compression. CDN can significantly reduce cloud egress fees.

https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/4949c88e.title: OS OpenNames Dataset
https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/4949c88e.info: Comprehensive dataset of place names, road numbers and postcodes for Great Britain. Available in CSV, GML, and GeoPackage formats. Updated quarterly and free to use under open data terms.

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS OpenNames Product Specification
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: OS OpenNames contains over 870,000 named and numbered roads, nearly 44,000 settlements, and over 1.6 million postcodes. Updated every three months (January, April, July, October) and free for commercial use.

https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/c1e0176d.title: Code-Point Open Dataset
https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/c1e0176d.info: Postcode units with precise geographical location for England, Scotland and Wales. Approximately 1.7 million postcodes with average of fifteen addresses per unit. Updated quarterly and free to use.

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS Boundary-Line Dataset
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Maps administrative boundaries across Great Britain including parliamentary constituencies and council wards. Updated twice a year (May and October), quality-assured to 1:10,000 scale.

https://historicengland.org.uk/listing/t.title: National Heritage List for England Data Downloads
https://historicengland.org.uk/listing/t.info: Official register of all nationally protected historic buildings and sites in England. Available as GIS spatial data, polygons, and points. Updated regularly with over 378,400 entries.

https://historicengland.org.uk/terms/web.title: Historic England Open Data Hub Terms and Conditions
https://historicengland.org.uk/terms/web.info: Historic England open data hub datasets are licensed under Open Government Licence v3 (OGL) for commercial and non-commercial use. Free worldwide, perpetual, non-exclusive licence.

https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/doc/.title: Open Government Licence v3.0
https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/doc/.info: Comprehensive licensing framework allowing free, flexible use of public sector information including copying, adapting, and commercial/non-commercial use with attribution requirements.

https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.title: ONS Postcode Licensing Terms
https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.info: Postcode products derived from Code-Point Open are subject to Open Government Licence v3.0. Includes attribution requirements for OS and Royal Mail data.

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/local-author.title: Local Authority Transport Data Publishing Guidance
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/local-author.info: Official guidance for local authorities on publishing transport data, covering standards, licensing requirements, and open data practices including OS data publishing criteria.

https://www.bl.uk/collection.title: British Library Collections
https://www.bl.uk/collection.info: Free access to over 170 million collection items including books, newspapers, maps, audio recordings, photos, patents, and stamps. Free Reader Pass required for physical materials.

https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/help.title: UK Census Records Research Guide
https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/help.info: Comprehensive access to historical UK census records from 1841 to 1921. Street-level data available from 1851 onwards, with detailed address information and building descriptions.

https://www.freeukgenealogy.org.uk/.title: Free UK Genealogy Platform
https://www.freeukgenealogy.org.uk/.info: Free online access to family history records under Creative Commons CC0 Public Domain Dedication. 295M birth/marriage/death records, 50M census individuals, 62M parish registers.

https://ukdataservice.ac.uk/help/data-ty.title: UK Data Service Census Data
https://ukdataservice.ac.uk/help/data-ty.info: Access to census data including aggregate data, microdata, flow data, and boundary datasets. Many datasets available under Open Government Licence with Common GIS formats.

https://supabase.com/pricing.title: Supabase Pricing and Plans
https://supabase.com/pricing.info: Free tier: 500MB database, 1GB file storage, 50,000 MAUs, shared CPU/500MB RAM. Pro tier $25/month for 8GB disk, 100,000 MAUs.

https://supabase.com/docs/guides/databas.title: PostGIS Extension on Supabase
https://supabase.com/docs/guides/databas.info: PostGIS support via Postgres extension with spatial data types (Point, Polygon, LineString), GIST indexing, and geographic distance queries using <-> operator.

https://neon.com/pricing.title: Neon Pricing Plans
https://neon.com/pricing.info: Free tier: 0.5GB database storage, 100 CU-hours compute, up to 2 CU (8GB RAM), autoscaling, PostGIS support, 20 projects, built-in connection pooling.

https://neon.com/docs/extensions/postgis.title: Neon PostGIS Documentation
https://neon.com/docs/extensions/postgis.info: Full PostGIS extension support with GEOMETRY/GEOGRAPHY types, GIST indexing, spatial functions like ST_DWithin, ST_Intersects, ST_Buffer for geographic operations.

https://railway.com/pricing.title: Railway Pricing and Plans
https://railway.com/pricing.info: Free tier: 30-day trial with $5 credits, then $1/month minimum. PostgreSQL hosting based on CPU/memory usage: $0.00000386/GB/sec memory, $0.00000772/vCPU/sec CPU.

https://planetscale.com/pricing.title: PlanetScale Pricing and Plans
https://planetscale.com/pricing.info: No free tier - Scaler Pro from $29/month, includes 25GB storage, 50M writes, 100B reads. Single-node PostgreSQL $5/month. Enterprise plans with custom pricing.

https://pgloader.readthedocs.io/en/lates.title: SQLite to PostgreSQL Migration with pgloader
https://pgloader.readthedocs.io/en/lates.info: Comprehensive migration tool supporting automatic schema discovery, data type conversion, index building, and partial migrations. Handles SQLite to PostgreSQL conversion with minimal configuration.

https://sqlite.org/limits.html.title: SQLite Implementation Limits
https://sqlite.org/limits.html.info: Database size limits: 281TB maximum (3.33+), 2000 max columns, 1 billion byte max string length. Concurrency limitations for production use with multiple users.

https://chat2db.ai/resources/blog/compar.title: MySQL vs PostgreSQL Performance Comparison
https://chat2db.ai/resources/blog/compar.info: PostgreSQL excels in complex queries with advanced indexing (GiST, GIN), while MySQL is faster for read-heavy workloads. PostgreSQL better for 1M+ records with proper indexing.

https://openai.com/api/pricing/.title: API Pricing - OpenAI
https://openai.com/api/pricing/.info: Detailed pricing for GPT models including GPT-4o mini ($0.15/1M input tokens, $0.60/1M output tokens), GPT-5.1 ($1.25/1M input, $10/1M output), and cost optimization features

https://huggingface.co/pricing.title: Hugging Face Pricing
https://huggingface.co/pricing.info: Pricing structure with $9/month PRO account, starting inference endpoints at $0.033/hour, hourly rates for various CPU/GPU/TPU instances

https://research.google.com/colaboratory.title: Google Colab FAQ
https://research.google.com/colaboratory.info: Free GPU access with heavily restricted usage, session duration up to 12 hours, hardware varies over time, no guarantees on availability

https://github.com/tatuylonen/wiktextrac.title: Wiktionary Data Extractor
https://github.com/tatuylonen/wiktextrac.info: Comprehensive Wiktionary data extraction tool processing English edition in ~1.25 hours on 128-core system, extracts etymologies and linguistic data

https://github.com/droher/etymology-db.title: Etymology Database
https://github.com/droher/etymology-db.info: 4.2M+ etymological relationships across 2M+ terms in 3300+ languages/dialects, derived from Wiktionary data with 31 relationship types

https://huggingface.co/docs/hub/en/rate-.title: Hub Rate Limits
https://huggingface.co/docs/hub/en/rate-.info: Free tier limits: 5000 requests/5min for resolvers, 1000/5min for Hub APIs, 200/5min for pages. Premium accounts get higher limits

https://operations.osmfoundation.org/pol.title: OpenStreetMap Tile Usage Policy
https://operations.osmfoundation.org/pol.info: Free service funded by donations with no pricing. Prohibits bulk downloading, pre-seeding, automated scans at high zoom levels (z≥14), and commercial usage. Requires local caching and proper attribution. Access can be withdrawn without notice.

https://operations.osmfoundation.org/pol.title: Nominatim Usage Policy
https://operations.osmfoundation.org/pol.info: Maximum 1 request per second per website/application. Requires valid HTTP Referer or User-Agent. Commercial applications permitted but usage may be unstable. Not suitable for serving paying customers due to limited capacity.

https://opencagedata.com/pricing.title: OpenCage Geocoding API Pricing
https://opencagedata.com/pricing.info: Free trial: 2,500 requests/day, 1 request/second. Paid plans from $50/month (10,000 requests/day, 15 rps) to Enterprise ($2000+/month). Soft limits allowed, no surge pricing. Store data permanently permitted.

https://locationiq.com/pricing.title: LocationIQ Pricing Tiers
https://locationiq.com/pricing.info: Free tier: 5,000 requests/day, 2 rps, commercial use with link-back required. Paid plans from $45/month (10,000 map views/day) to Enterprise (custom limits). Soft daily limits allow 100% additional requests for most paid plans.

https://www.maptiler.com/cloud/pricing/.title: MapTiler Cloud Pricing
https://www.maptiler.com/cloud/pricing/.info: Free: 5,000 sessions/month, 100,000 requests/month, non-commercial use only. Paid plans: Flex $25/month (25,000 sessions, 500k requests), Unlimited $295/month (300k sessions, 5M requests). Vector tiles cost 1 request per tile.

https://stadiamaps.com/pricing/.title: Stadia Maps Pricing and Credit System
https://stadiamaps.com/pricing/.info: Free: 200,000 monthly credits, no commercial use. Starter: $20/month (1M credits), $3/1000 additional. Standard: $80/month (7.5M credits), $2/1000 additional. Professional: $250/month (25M credits), $1.5/1000 additional. Various credit costs for different services (tiles, geocoding, routing).

https://www.maplibre.org/maplibre-gl-js/.title: MapLibre GL JS Large Dataset Performance Guide
https://www.maplibre.org/maplibre-gl-js/.info: WebGL-based high-performance rendering for large datasets and smooth animations. More resource-intensive but excellent for complex maps with dynamic features. Supports vector tiles, clustering, and optimized data loading. Ideal for handling 1M+ markers with proper optimization.

https://blog.jawg.io/maplibre-gl-vs-leaf.title: MapLibre GL JS vs Leaflet Performance Comparison
https://blog.jawg.io/maplibre-gl-vs-leaf.info: Standard HTML/CSS/JS without WebGL. Lightweight and lower resource consumption but less performant for heavy maps. Suitable for simpler maps where performance isn't the primary concern. Limited scalability with large datasets.

https://postgis.net/docs/using_postgis_q.title: PostGIS Spatial Queries and Performance
https://postgis.net/docs/using_postgis_q.info: Comprehensive spatial query capabilities with DE-9IM model, named predicates (ST_Contains, ST_Intersects, etc.), and performance optimization via spatial indexes. Bounding box operators (&&) and distance operators (<?->) for efficient querying. Index-aware functions crucial for large dataset performance.

https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Rast.title: Commercial Raster Tile Providers
https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Rast.info: Various commercial raster tile providers including Carto, Thunderforest, Geofabrik, Lima Labs, Tracestrack. Most offer free tiers for non-commercial use (20M-200k tiles/month) but require registration. Pricing typically ranges from free to several hundred dollars per month for commercial use.

https://coordable.co/blog/country-analys.title: Best Geocoding Providers for United Kingdom
https://coordable.co/blog/country-analys.info: Comprehensive UK-focused analysis comparing geocoding providers. UK uses PAF/AddressBase/UPRN for postal-grade validation. OS Places API (£1000/month free via PSGA) best for government. Commercial options: Google (40k/month free, $5/1000), HERE (30k/month free, $1/1000), TomTom (75k/month free, $0.75/1000). OpenCage: 75k/month free, starting $0.15/1000.

https://docs.github.com/en/pages/getting.title: GitHub Pages Limits Documentation
https://docs.github.com/en/pages/getting.info: Official documentation detailing GitHub Pages free tier limits including 100GB bandwidth, 1GB storage, 10 builds/hour, 1GB source repository, and 10-minute deployment timeout

https://developers.cloudflare.com/pages/.title: Cloudflare Pages Limits Documentation
https://developers.cloudflare.com/pages/.info: Comprehensive limits for Cloudflare Pages free tier: 500 builds/month, 20,000 files maximum, 25 MiB per file, 100 custom domains per project, and unlimited bandwidth (no explicit limits stated)

https://vercel.com/docs/limits.title: Vercel Limits Documentation
https://vercel.com/docs/limits.info: Complete Vercel Hobby plan limits including 100GB bandwidth, 1M function invocations, 45-minute build time, 1M edge requests, and various other constraints for free tier usage

https://developers.cloudflare.com/worker.title: Cloudflare Workers and Pages Functions Pricing
https://developers.cloudflare.com/worker.info: Free tier details for Cloudflare Workers and Pages Functions: 100,000 requests/day, 10ms CPU time per invocation, 1GB storage, and no data transfer charges for static requests

https://vercel.com/docs/plans/hobby.title: Vercel Hobby Plan Documentation
https://vercel.com/docs/plans/hobby.info: Detailed Hobby plan specifications: free for personal use, 1M function invocations, 4 CPU-hours active, 360 GB-hours provisioned memory, 1M edge requests, and various feature limitations

https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.title: ONS Postcode Products - Postcode products overview
https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.info: Comprehensive information about ONS postcode products including ONSPD and NSPL, with data formats (CSV, TXT), licensing (free), coverage (UK), and quarterly update frequency

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: AddressBase - Data Products
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Detailed specifications for Ordnance Survey AddressBase products, covering 29 million addresses with UPRN matching, CSV/GML formats, 6-week updates, and Great Britain coverage

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS Open Names - Data Products
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Information on OS Open Names dataset with over 870,000 roads, 44,000 settlements, and 1.6 million postcodes, updated quarterly under OS OpenData Plan

https://www.poweredbypaf.com/.title: Powered by PAF - Official PAF Information
https://www.poweredbypaf.com/.info: Details on PAF as UK's most accurate address database with 32+ million addresses and 1.8+ million postcodes, updated weekly with 50,000+ business users

https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.title: ONS Names and Codes Listings
https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.info: ONS names and codes listings for UK administrative geographies including counties, regions, wards with GSS codes in CSV/Excel formats

https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/data.title: ONS Postcode Directory (February 2024) for the UK
https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/data.info: ONS Postcode Directory February 2024 - 231MB quarterly updated dataset linking postcodes to administrative areas under custom license

https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/7ec10db7.title: National Statistics Postcode Lookup UK
https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/7ec10db7.info: National Statistics Postcode Lookup dataset for UK with 2021 Census basis, free access under OGL v3.0 with XML/JSON/RDF/CSV formats

https://www.planning.data.gov.uk/dataset.title: Local Authority District Dataset
https://www.planning.data.gov.uk/dataset.info: Local authority district dataset in England with 344 districts, available in CSV/JSON/GeoJSON formats under OGL v3.0

https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/a76a9de2.title: Local Authority District to County and Unitary Authority Lookup (April 2025)
https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/a76a9de2.info: LAD to County and Unitary Authority lookup for England and Wales as of April 2025, with KML/GeoJSON/CSV formats available

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: Boundary-Line - OS Data Products
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Ordnance Survey Boundary-Line dataset covering all administrative boundaries in Great Britain, updated twice yearly, available under OGL

https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.title: ONS Digital Boundaries
https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.info: ONS digital boundaries in various formats including Shapefile, with different resolutions and coastal extent options, under OGL v3.0

https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/data.title: Counties and Unitary Authorities Boundaries UK (December 2024)
https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/data.info: Counties and Unitary Authorities boundaries dataset for UK as of December 2024, generalised 20m resolution, with API access

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS Open Roads - Data Products
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: OS Open Roads dataset covering high-level road network in Great Britain with motorways to country lanes, updated twice yearly, free under OS OpenData Plan

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: AddressBase Premium - Data Products
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: AddressBase Premium containing 40+ million addresses with UPRN unique references, updated every 6 weeks, covering Great Britain

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS Names API - Data Products
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: OS Names API providing 2.5M identifiable places, 44k settlements, 870k+ roads, updated quarterly, free API with RESTful interface

https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/03d48dba.title: National Address Gazetteer Dataset
https://www.data.gov.uk/dataset/03d48dba.info: National Address Gazetteer created by GeoPlace combining local authority and Ordnance Survey data with UPRN/USRN unique identifiers

https://www.geoplace.co.uk/addresses-str.title: GeoPlace Street Data and Services
https://www.geoplace.co.uk/addresses-str.info: GeoPlace street data services including National Street Gazetteer, USRN identifiers, and API access for England and Wales street network

https://www.poweredbypaf.com/pricing/.title: PAF Pricing Solutions
https://www.poweredbypaf.com/pricing/.info: PAF pricing information from Royal Mail including £105+VAT per user licence, commercial and public sector pricing tiers

https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/doc/.title: Open Government Licence v3.0
https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/doc/.info: Open Government Licence v3.0 terms and conditions for UK government datasets with attribution requirements and commercial use rights

https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.title: ONS Licensing Terms
https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.info: ONS licensing terms and conditions for geographic datasets including custom licenses and OGL compliance

https://osdatahub.os.uk/plans.title: OS Data Hub Plans and Pricing
https://osdatahub.os.uk/plans.info: OS Data Hub plans including Premium API pricing, PSGA membership for free public sector access, and transaction limits

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/custome.title: PSGA Membership Terms
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/custome.info: Public Sector Geospatial Agreement providing free access to Premium OS data for public sector members including cost structure

https://data.southwark.gov.uk/.title: Southwark Data Portal
https://data.southwark.gov.uk/.info: Main data portal providing free access to local data on communities, health, housing, environment, and economy. Features 8 data themes and postcode-based ward profile search. Built on Esri UK platform.

https://lewisham.gov.uk/mayorandcouncil/.title: Lewisham Open Data and Transparency
https://lewisham.gov.uk/mayorandcouncil/.info: Council open data initiative page but detailed content extraction failed - may require browser interaction

https://dataobservatory.royalgreenwich.g.title: Royal Greenwich Data Observatory
https://dataobservatory.royalgreenwich.g.info: Data observatory providing interactive intelligence about the borough with postcode/ward search and interactive mapping. Covers population, health, housing, crime, economy, and environment data.

https://www.westminster.gov.uk/about-cou.title: Westminster City Council Data Portal
https://www.westminster.gov.uk/about-cou.info: Council data hub page providing access to various datasets about Westminster, population, environment, and other measures. Contains links to specific data categories.

https://www.bexley.gov.uk/discover-bexle.title: Bexley Data Hub
https://www.bexley.gov.uk/discover-bexle.info: One-stop-shop for Bexley data providing insights into borough demographics and council services. Links to external public datasets and allows comparison across different years and areas.

https://lb-lewisham.github.io/open-data-.title: Open Data Lewisham Portal
https://lb-lewisham.github.io/open-data-.info: Detailed access to street datasets, transport data, and geospatial information. Provides SQLite databases with JSON API endpoints, including FixMyStreet history, electric vehicle chargepoints, ward boundaries, and planning consultations.

https://www.bexley.gov.uk/services/parki.title: Bexley Publicly Maintained Highway Records
https://www.bexley.gov.uk/services/parki.info: Comprehensive list of streets maintained by the borough authority, categorized by maintenance responsibility (public, private, mixed). Includes street descriptions, maintenance status, and traffic scheme information. Last updated October 2023.

https://gis-tfl.opendata.arcgis.com/.title: TfL GIS Open Data Hub
https://gis-tfl.opendata.arcgis.com/.info: Main TfL GIS platform providing free access to geospatial transport data under OGL. Features categorized datasets including road, transport, and boundary data with RSS feeds, DCAT feeds, and OGC API access methods.

https://www.royalgreenwich.gov.uk/downlo.title: Greenwich Road Register Download
https://www.royalgreenwich.gov.uk/downlo.info: Direct access to Greenwich road register in both PDF (1.04 MB) and CSV (294 KB) formats. Lists all streets in the borough with no special access requirements.

https://postcodes.io/.title: Postcodes.io: Postcode & Geolocation API for the UK
https://postcodes.io/.info: Free, open-source API for UK postcode lookup and geolocation with regular updates from OS and ONS data sources

https://getaddress.io/.title: Simple APIs for UK Addresses
https://getaddress.io/.info: UK address APIs with flexible subscription pricing from £3-240/month, daily updates from multiple data sources including Ordnance Survey

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/access-free-.title: Access free address data using AddressBase
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/access-free-.info: Free address data through AddressBase products for PSGA members, includes 33 million addresses with UPRN standard

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS Open Names Dataset
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Free dataset of place names, road numbers, and postcodes for Great Britain with 870k+ roads, 44k+ settlements, updated quarterly

https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.title: ONS Postcode Products
https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geogr.info: Free NSPL and ONSPD datasets updated quarterly with postcode-to-geography mapping for UK postcodes

https://www.poweredbypaf.com/pricing/.title: PAF Pricing and Licensing
https://www.poweredbypaf.com/pricing/.info: Commercial licensing for Postcode Address File with tiered pricing including free access for microbusinesses and charities under specific criteria

https://ideal-postcodes.co.uk/pricing.title: Ideal Postcodes Pricing
https://ideal-postcodes.co.uk/pricing.info: Premium UK address API with pay-as-you-go pricing £9-900 for 200-32,100 credits, includes UPRN and rooftop geocodes

https://developers.google.com/maps/docum.title: Address Validation API Coverage
https://developers.google.com/maps/docum.info: Google's address validation API with full support for UK including residential/commercial address metadata

https://mapsplatform.google.com/pricing/.title: Google Maps Platform Pricing
https://mapsplatform.google.com/pricing/.info: Maps Platform pricing from $100-1,200/month with up to 250k monthly calls, includes geocoding and address validation

https://www.api.gov.uk/os/os-places-api/.title: OS Places API
https://www.api.gov.uk/os/os-places-api/.info: UK's most comprehensive online address database with postcode and address search capabilities for England, Scotland, Wales

https://coordable.co/blog/uk-address-pos.title: UK Address and Postal Data FAQ
https://coordable.co/blog/uk-address-pos.info: Comprehensive FAQ covering AddressBase, UPRN, PAF, and alternatives including OpenStreetMap and crowdsourced solutions

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: AddressBase Product Details
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Addresses 29 million Royal Mail postal addresses matched to UPRNs, updated every six weeks, free for PSGA members

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: Code-Point Open - Official Product Page
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Free dataset of 1.7 million postcodes in Great Britain, updated quarterly, includes administrative unit codes and NHS health authority codes

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS Open Names - Official Product Page
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Comprehensive free dataset with 870,000+ named roads, 44,000+ settlements, 1.6 million+ postcodes, updated quarterly under OGL license

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: AddressBase - Official Product Page
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Matches 29M Royal Mail addresses to UPRNs, includes PAF data with coordinates, updated every six weeks, commercial product with free samples available

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS Open UPRN - Official Product Page
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: Free UPRN identifiers for 40M addressable locations in Great Britain, updated every six weeks, available in CSV and GeoPackage formats

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: OS Open Roads - Official Product Page
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: High-level road network data (replaces discontinued Meridian 2), includes motorways to country lanes, updated twice yearly (April/Nov), free under OGL

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.title: AddressBase Core - Official Product Page
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/product.info: 33M+ unique addresses with UPRNs and coordinates, weekly updates, free for PSGA members, commercial licensing available through partners

https://www.api.gov.uk/os/os-names-api/.title: OS Names API - Official Documentation
https://www.api.gov.uk/os/os-names-api/.info: Free API for searching populated places, road names, road numbers, and postcodes across England, Scotland, Wales, launched July 2020

https://www.api.gov.uk/os/os-places-api/.title: OS Places API - Official Documentation
https://www.api.gov.uk/os/os-places-api/.info: Secure address lookup API for UK addresses, supports postcode and address search, includes geosearch tool for closest properties, launched July 2020

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/access-free-.title: Access free address data using AddressBase
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/access-free-.info: Government guidance on free AddressBase access through PSGA for public sector, includes UPRN standard compliance and weekly updates information

https://osdatahub.os.uk/plans.title: OS Data Hub Plans and Pricing
https://osdatahub.os.uk/plans.info: £1,000 monthly free allowance for premium data, OS OpenData always free, pricing model for APIs and premium datasets
